model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a Ship entity, holding its absolute position and its characteristics (type, length, direction).
    Author:
    20027017 & 20031485

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(ShipType shipType,
            int length,
            int gameSize)
        Constructor for the class Ship. It creates a Ship object with no absolute position yet.
        Parameters:
        shipType - The type of the Ship ShipType
        length - The length of the Ship ShipLength
        gameSize - The size of the game grid

    • Method Detail

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        A method that returns the length of a Ship object
        Returns:
        The integer representing the length of the Ship object

      • setShip

        public boolean setShip(int x,
                       int y,
                       ShipDirection direction,
                       boolean[][] shipsGrid)
        A method for assigning an absolute position to a Ship object and then positioning it onto a Player's shipsGrid
        Parameters:
        x - The row coordinate for positioning the Ship
        y - The column coordinate for positioning the Ship
        direction - Defines the vertical/horizontal orientation of the Ship
        shipsGrid - the Player's game grid where the Ship is being set
        Returns:
        true if the positioning is successful, false on failure

      • enoughSpace

        public boolean enoughSpace(int x,
                           int y,
                           ShipDirection direction,
                           boolean[][] shipsGrid)
        A method for checking if there is enough space on the grid for the Ship which is being set.
        Parameters:
        x - The row coordinate where the Ship is being set
        y - The column coordinate where the Ship is being set
        direction - The vertical/horizontal orientation of the Ship being set
        shipsGrid - The Player's game grid being probed
        Returns:
        true if the Ship can be set, false if it cannot

      • setShipOnShipsGrid

        public void setShipOnShipsGrid(boolean[][] shipsGrid)
        Overlaps the Ship's absolute position to the Player's game grid to set the Ship on it
        Parameters:
        shipsGrid - The Player's game grid

      • removeShip

        public void removeShip()
        Removes a Ship from its absolute position

      • isSunk

        public boolean isSunk()
        A method to check if a Ship has been sunk completely
        Returns:
        true if there are no more false cells in the Ship's absolute position, false otherwise

      • isHit

        public boolean isHit(int row,
                     int col)
        A method mimicking an incoming hit
        Parameters:
        row - Row coordinate where the hit is addressed
        col - Column coordinate where the hit is addressed
        Returns:
        true if the current ship has been hit, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Utility method for printing a Ship object, mostly used for debugging purposes
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
